predicate.note: Frames file for 'brim' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with contain.

roleset.name: be full up to the brim

example.name: the only example?
example.text: Whether Polly Peck's acquisition makes sense remains to be seen, but at the news conference, Mr. Nadir brimmed with self-confidence that he can turn Sansui around.
example.arg: with self-confidence that he can turn Sansui around

example.name: overflow
example.text: John brims over with pent-up sexual frustration.
